knimeNode.name: R 2D Plot
knimeNode.shortDescription: Shows a 2D R plot as png view generated on an R Server.

fullDescription.intro:
Shows a 2D R plot as a png view generated on an R Server. Select two numeric columns, which are then displayed in the classic x,y diagram. Missing values are not supported yet.
R installation:
In order to get the R nodes running, you have to install the R-project first, see www.r-project.org. Also the R Server that responds to R commands has to be installed and running, see http://stats.math.uni-augsburg.de/Rserve. Please note that in the current version the R Server needs to be restarted from time to time. If an R node hangs, interrupt the R Server and restart it. Warnings and errors are printed in the R Server window.
fullDescription.option:
Enter R commands here, for instance for computing the Covariance of two columns:
R<-var(cbind(var(Col0,Col1))
The IP of the computer where the R Server is running, for example localhost with IP 127.0.0.1
The login name can be empty.

views.view: The 2D view as generated by R.
